main.name: Taber Fisher
main.description: I am a student at Virgina Tech majoring in Computer Science. I have a passion for Artifical Intellegence, Rocketry, and Rock climbing
main.bio: I am currently a senior studying computer science at Virginia Tech. I have the most experince using machine learning and Artifical Intellegence to solve tricky problems. The langueses I use the most are Python, Java, C#, and JavaScript
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Majoring in Computer Science with a Mathematics Minor, Part of the Honors College, Studied abroad in Spring of 2016

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Created image recognition software that used TensorFlow for vehicle detection on satellite and aerial imagery with an accuracy of 98 percent, Developed recommendation algorithm to assist users in choosing overlays to place on maps

work.title: Lead Software Architect
work.description: Used the Google Cloud Platform to build a machine learning platform to analyze data pulled from flight sensors to predict when anomalies occur and when active drag flaps should be deployed, Designed active drag system software in C++ so the rocket hit an exact target height, Authored a safety report on Hybrid Rocket Engines (HRE) so the team could begin development on construction of our own HRE for the IREC competition

work.title: Applications & Data Systems Intern
work.description: Created and presented a movie recommendation engine in Python to upper level management that is undergoing testing for worldwide implementation on the AMC website, Built an app in C# that streamlined the process for adding new members to the AMC Stubs program, Utilized React.js, Relay, and GraphQL to design multiple features on the AMC website, including making the site more handicap accessible, modernizing the search bar, and hybridizing the ticket purchasing page

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description: Researched speeding up training phase of a Brain Computer Interface (BCI) by using deep learning

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description: Created a program using deep neural networks for walking prediction on a person's step with a 95% accuracy

research.title: Undergraduate Researcher
research.description: Won 2nd place at Virginia Tech Undergraduate Computer Science Symposium for research in creating a musical score search engine that should search MusicXML files

projects.title: Rocketry@VT Website
projects.category: The Website that I helped design and build for my rocketry team

projects.title: Rocketry@VT Github
projects.category: A team repository where the machine learning that I do on rockets is housed
